Date: 1. Record your gauge reading periodically (weekly or whenever you check)
2. Enter: Date and Gauge % (columns A and B)
4. Other columns calculate consumption since last reading
5. HDD Period: manually enter total HDD between readings (from Weather Data sheet)
• Today: Check gauge (e.g., 65%), enter date and 65 in columns A & B
• Next week: Check gauge (e.g., 58%), enter new date and 58
• Sheet calculates: 70L used, 10L/day, and if you enter HDD, it shows L/HDD
✓ See immediate impact of window replacement
